titleStmt.title: Good counsel and advice unto the magistrates and people of Norwich with a brief relation of some of the sufferings of the people of God, called, Quakers in the said city.
titleStmt.author: Gibson, William, 1629-1684. aut

notesStmt.note: Signed on p.4: William Gibson [and 8 others].
Reproduction of the original in the British Library (reel 1848) and the Swarthmore College, Pennsylvania (reel 2209).
